name: The Ribbon Club
description:
Button Bit is the newest member of the Ribbon Club, and is quite excited to go to the latest meeting -- until she remembers, the host of said meeting is supposed to be her ... And the others are going to arrive any moment!

The Ribbon Club is a two-week adventure game made for the Short and Sweet Game Jam .

Arrow keys - move
Z - confirm, progress dialogue
Enter - confirm, bring up list

The music is by
Aaron Ishibashi (http://aishibashimusic.com)  and
Maemi no Yume (@maemi_no_yume on twitter)

I hope you enjoy it!

PS. If the game won't run, please make sure you have XNA 4.0 installed. One of the downloads contains an installer.
